body: Well, there are only that many poses and angles so I don't see a problem. It's not like he traced over. I mean, going by your argument everyone's lifting poses for basic positions like doggy, missionary etc...

A lot of artists lift poses and whatnot from other artists and images, maybe not as blatant as the one here, but not entirely uncommon. So long as Tamagoro doesn't make this a habit, I'm more than willing to look the other way this once... Still, it is rather off-putting, and an explanation would be nice.
@nickvreL Search for "Boys' and Girls' Summer". At least three poses in the last chapter here are directly lifted from it.
Where is this island and how can I get there?
The fact that an artist such as Tamagoro would go as far as directly tracing some of Minazuki's work is a bit off-putting...
